original_title: Gazette notification brings fuel supply, power, healthcare under essential services
original_body_lines: A special Gazette notification (2332/12) has been issued, declaring the supply and distribution of petroleum products and fuel, electricity supply, all services, work or labour as essential services.
The Gazette notification and the declarations therein came into effect from yesterday (17).

According to the notification, all services connected to the supply of electricity, the supply or distribution of petroleum products and fuel, all services, work or labour of any description whatsoever, necessary or required to be done in connection with the maintenance, and reception, care, feeding and treatment of patients in hospitals, nursing homes, dispensaries and other similar institutions have been made essential services. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
